short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily track your reading progress with automatically marked links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily track the reading status of any page. All the links to these pages are automatically highlighted on the original website, helping you keep track of your reading progress of large documentations or books.

Release notes: 
3.0.0 (2023-11-29)
Features: 
-     redesign popup, add search

BREAKING CHANGES

    the status 'started' was removed. Existing starting entries are automatically merged with 'todo' (unread) status. As there is now only todo (unread) and done (read), I also remove the configuration options.
